general.question: What stood out in your experience?
How helpful and knowledgeable was everyone?
Is there anything that would improve your experience?
Would you recommend us to your friends and family?
Is there any other thoughts or feedback you'd like to share?

questions: How satisfied were you with the variety and availability of products?
Was the store layout and organization easy to navigate?
How did you find the checkout process? Was it smooth and efficient?
Do you plan to shop with us again? Why or why not?
Were prices and promotions clear and fair?
How consistent and reliable has our service been over time?
Do you feel the service meets your expectations on a regular basis?
How responsive have we been to your questions or concerns?
Are there any improvements you’d like us to make for your ongoing service?
How likely are you to continue using our services regularly?
How satisfied were you with the timeliness of the service?
Was the service completed to your expectations and standards?
How well did our team communicate with you throughout the process?
Were there any issues during or after the service that you’d like to mention?
Would you consider hiring us again for future one-time projects?
